articles.title: Hit the gas: industry urges government support to fire COVID recovery - Sydney Morning Herald
articles.description: The gas industry is calling on government for greater financial support and faster environment approvals to spur investment and fire up Australia's economic recovery from the coronavirus pandemic.
articles.content:
"Without concerted action, Australias ability to harness new investment will be greatly diminished, Mr McConville said.
